bandit_issue_text: Using xmlrpclib to parse untrusted XML data is known to be vulnerable to XML attacks. Use defused.xmlrpc.monkey_patch() function to monkey-patch xmlrpclib and mitigate XML vulnerabilities.
Use of assert detected. The enclosed code will be removed when compiling to optimised byte code.

pylint_message: standard import "import subprocess" should be placed before "import pkg_resources"
bandit_issue_text: Consider possible security implications associated with subprocess module.
